        public void setMin(int min)
        Sets the minimum value a user can select. Throws an illegal argument exception if the value is less than 0 or more than the max value.
        Parameters:
        min - the minimum value

      • setMax

        public void setMax(int max)
        Sets the maximum value a user can select. Throws an illegal argument exception if the value is less than 0 or less than the min value.
        Parameters:
        max - the maximum value

      • setNumber

        public void setNumber(int current)
        Sets the current number selection. Throws an illegal argument exception if the value is not within the bounds of the min and max value.
        Parameters:
        current - set the current number
